question: As per the recent guidelines by the UGC, the Institutions of Eminence can open how many foreign campuses?
explanation:
The University Grants Commission has issued guidelines for the Institutions of Eminence (IoEs) to launch centres and full-fledged campuses in foreign countries.
Each of the 20 higher education institutes has been allowed to open up to three centres abroad in the next five years. The institutions need to be approved by three ministries namely Education, Home and External affairs.
